content.detailedDescription: While filling this out i can't help but wonder if maybe it was a shooting star that was on a direct path at me.  i was in the mall parking lot in west burlington chatting with a friend.  i looked toward the west in the sky (towards target) and i noticed a light that was faint and got larger, as though it may have been a plane turning.  it got larger and more obvious and i didn't think much of it.  i looked away for only a moment and then looked back and it was gone.  i scanned the sky while continue to chat with my friend, but was unable to see anything in the sky where the light may have went.  my initial feeling was "that's odd" as i wasn't able to locate the light or a plane anywhere (the sky was clear and it was a well lit sunset at the time).  i didn't think anything of it, but i kept thinking about it after i got home.  i felt like reporting it just because it seemed odd and nothing i had noticed before.  it may have been nothing, but i've been wrong before (not relevant to this, but i once walked right passed jon bon jovi while living in chicago and didn't realize it until was about 30 feet passed him).
content.summary: Glowing light in distance then just gone

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were chatting in the drive way when i happened to look up and noticed a slow moving black bubble traveling from west to east.  sky was still slightly lit prior to sunset. by far, the strangest thing i had ever seen.
content.summary: Appeared as a slow passing black soap bubble.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed it between 1:30 and 2:00 p.M.Closer to 2:00 probably   there is crystal airport (2 miles away from me)in that vicinity it would have been skirting the northern end it was higher by alot  than the usual small plane traffic when they are  either landing or taking off i was driving home almost home noticed it then i saw the sun reflect off it. moving n.E.  lost it in the trees couldnt follow it from where i was looking from looked very odd seemed roundish no wings i have seen white weather balloons before moving east up very high. this wasnt high like that maybe a mile up?  could have been bell shaped or even wobbleing i saw it for approx 10 -20 seconds clear sky no clouds   probably 2- 3 miles away hard to tell  nothing to compare it with but the wind doesnt blow that way usually i would think crystal airport would have a radar image  we get jet traffic for the minneapolis airport jets ,medical helos fly over all the time military flights from camp ripley go over us also . i havent seen this before it was  out of the ordinary for sure. i have seen some strange aircraft over the years before this did give one pause... i would think being in the vicinity of the crystal airport there would be a concern plus a radar image i have even seen drones from the highway patrol but that was at night  and alot lower etc wasnt a drone would have to have been a very large ballon didnt appear as that looked very metallic / reflected the sun  for a couple of seconds
content.summary: I am used to seeing various aircraft helo's jets small planes  i have also seen weather balloons white   at extreme altitude

content.detailedDescription: I went outside at 8:25 pm, on july 12, 2016, to do some chores outside before it got dark. it was not dark at that time. i noticed this object in the sky right away, it just stuck out, not looking like anything normal you would see in the sky. it was low enough that i know for a fact it did not have any wings, or a tail wing. it made no sound, and left no trail behind. it was going in the direction of south-east slowly and appeared it was going straight. i first thought it was a cylinder shape, but cigar shape would also apply to me in what it looked like. it was a silver color, but not a bright color. i did not notice any lights. i watched it for a few minutes, than ran into the house, which was close, to grab my binoculars, and ran out. it was gone. i know what i saw.
content.summary: I went outside at 8:25 pm and noticed this object in the sky heading se. it was just low enough that i know for a fact it had no wings, or a tail wing. it was moving slowly and straight forward. there was no sound or any trail of any kind behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
Unable to sleep (on schedule with usual medication 11yrs stable, only second sighting, both this year). glanced out of window, caught sight of intense light. looked more carefully and recognised same thing as last time. 
allowing for being downstairs and one room across, seemed roughly same area as last time. glanced at time 01.36 & called out to wake partner (he came to see briefly, but couldn't keep awake). better view of underside this time, in keeping with teardrop shape of last time (see also sketch).

as watched, hovered a while, then moved swiftly right, then perpendicularly up approximately half the distance. when hovering, light sequence has more red and sequences r-l with a regular black between. when moving, less intense, esp when moving vertically.

the variance from last time was that it was briefly joined by two more smaller objects (placement very difficult to describe, but can draw).

all three moved, relative to each other. sideways, up & down, then hovered. approx 2 mins after smaller ones appeared, faded a little, speed vertically and vanished.

remaining object became more active, mostly left and right (from my perspective, crossing one pane of window in a split second), then likewise, up and gone.

in all, approx 10 mins. glanced at clock - showed 01.31. looked again, showed 01.36 again though time had passed.

02.14 looked out having read this back and it was there again. moving faster, like when it departed the previous occurrence to tonight.
crossed right as before (one pane of window again, but faster), then changed course for a sharp, curved diagonal upwards (approx sse) and disappeared above top of window.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very similar to last occurrence, though observed from one floor down. hard to describe, but could draw. almost same time and duration. clock on tablet affected.

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting in my porch swing looking at the stars and enjoying the cool evening. i was facing a very bright star and as i watched it wobbled back and forth-returning to its beginning station. then it began to jerk back to the right, and return. next what i saw made me catch my breath. it ascended steadily, then returned to its station. there was then no doubt that it was moving in precise lines. i went inside and got my husband out of bed to witness this, not an easy task since his work day begins at 6 am. we watched it for sometime before he had to go back to bed. i watched for 10 minute , or so, intervals, going into the house on occasion because the mosquitos were bad. around 12:30 i was too sleepy and uncomfortable to watch anymore and i went to bed. the next night i looked for the light but it wasn't there, so it wasn't a star or planet or else it would be there.
content.summary: What i thought was a bright star bagan to wobble, then ascend in the air and back, and move back and forth

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work when i to this photo. i work in memphis,tn. the warehouse is only maybe 5 miles from memphis international airport. 
 i was on my lunch break from 1230 to 1 o'clock pm. i saw a large military cargo plane ( the kind that drops tanks out of the back with parachutes attached) taking off from the airport heading south, then turned to head east as it was taking off. the plane made a small maneuver, ( i thought to myself that the huge plane shouldn't try that at such a slow speed.) as the matallic orbs appeard out of the small clouds.  i grabbed my phone to try and capture both the plane and the orbs closer together.The military plane can still be seen very well by zooming in. i stopped looking at the orbs to check the photo for both plane and orbs,got them both, when i looked back to the sky i didnt see the orbs any more. also there appears to be a bird flying close to one of the orbs. i am including a screenshot of the details from the photo along with the photo, and map of where i work showing the airport. enjoy. also i have seen chinook helicopters flying in groups of three for the past few days, just throwing that in there.
content.summary: work close to memphis international airport. seen a military plane taking off and maneuver past objects

content.detailedDescription: July 2,2016,9:30pm...Arlington,tx...Went out back to smoke cig,i always look at stars while i smoke,was looking at plane which was about 10,000ft or so up,when from my left came a very large,translucent oval only about 500 feet or so from the ground,moving at an estimated 700-1000mph(without any sound whatsoever).It had to be only 500 yards or less from me.It flew across from behind me, into my view and across the sky,under neath the clouds.Southeast to northwest,slightly ascending.It took only 8-10 seconds to fly across entire unobstructed sky.Absolutely positive upon seeing this that there is nothing on this earth,that could be confused with it.It was like i was watching a movie because it was so surreal.Extremely large,fast,and intelligently controlled,without a doubt.Here's the strange part,two hours later,while asleep,i had the most intense sleep paralysis event ever.(had other type sleep paralysis events twice in lifetime,but was very young).In the event ,there was some kind of "force" outside my window,observing me.I just thought it was ironic,that the two happened within two hours of each other.Thank you
content.summary: Translucent orb,very large,estimated at 1000mph,and at 500ft from ground, and intense sleep paralysis event followed

content.detailedDescription:
Few days ago i reported the same thing. my case number was 77164.
on 8-7-2016 at the evening i was walking on roof and observing the sky. suddenly i saw a star like glowing object appeared at southeast top part of sky and moved a very short distance very slowly from right to left and just disappeared. if it were a shooting star then it will move too fast. and it also can't be a aeroplane/helicopter.. because then the light could be visible for longer periods. the object moves slowly and suddenly disappeared.

i actually don't know what was the thing!
content.summary: A star like glowing object wandered slowly right to left (i faced east) and disappeared suddenly after 2 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:30 or eleven pm i was going to bed and looked up at the stars. one of them was brighter than the others, and started moving in weird zigzag patterns.

when i first saw it i thought it was a helicopter or an airplane or a drone, but it was too bright for a drone and too strange a path for a heli or a plane. it descended into the horse field, and started a pulsating light at weird intervals.

there was also a light that went off and on at different places at the outline of the forest.

there is no light at the side of the cottage i was at, but there was a light shining steadily from the side, and every now and then there would be a cloaked figure that would seem to walk in front of it and dull the light.

the ringing started at about 12 midnight, and got unbearable within minutes. this stayed on for the rest of the sighting. for another 2 hours i watched the lights from my bedroom, and more zigzagging lights appeared in the sky, and one of them started flashing red as though it was crashing.

at about 2 i went to bed from exhaustion, and when i woke up at 3am to go to the bathroom, the lights were still there.

too bright for a firefly or a drone.
too strange a path for an airplane or a helicopter.

i fell back asleep at maybe 4, without the lights ceasing.
content.summary: Bright lights that descended into the horse field. also ringing noise and weird steady lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing on lake serene in catawissa mo when a red and orange circular object was spotted over the lake. being familiar w/ drones and the like i knew this was not the case. there was a pontoon on the lake and the young daughter 6-7 yelled "look daddy what is it". it was hovering at a speed of maybe 1-2 mph in a straight line fashion till it was out of sight. this was not a drone & i immediately thought ufo. nothing i have ever seen. my friend with me also witnessed it and swears we had just seen a ufo. we could not identify it as anything man made. i myself was a bit freaked out, thinking i hope its friendly and at the same time just amazed. in my 50's not on drugs and concidered pretty intelligent this was nothing i would consider man made or in the normal scope. i am happy that it continued on in a peaceful manner. i never thought i would ever in this life be documenting something of this magnitude. i saw what i saw and am not afraid to share that
content.summary: Fishing on lake when object appeared

content.detailedDescription:
Was taking photos of small rainbow from the beach in longport, nj. noticed object in photos when reviewed. photos took were rapid. 

i did not see the object but felt compelled to photo the sun when i saw the rainbow. i took several photos at the time of the incident but the object only showed up in 2.

what do you think it is? i have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Wasn't visible, shown up in photos

content.detailedDescription:
I was relaxing on my back yard with my wife and noticed an unusual black (jet black) object moving in slow rotation, looked like one blade fan rotating slowly but going in a laser straight line with constant speed(not too fast)and the same altitude. it had a substance / mass, to me it looked like a single blade fan, my wife described it as a teardrop like object with a handle, object was rotating. it definitely looked alien, absolutely no drone or balloon characteristics. we felt excitement about the sighting but it was more of an assurance feeling than surprise. object flew until i lost it in the horizon.

attached video was made with a cellphone so quality is not the best but a rotation and constant speed may be observed. video is rotated at 90 degrees so it looks like the object is traveling from north to south where in fact it's traveling from east to west. background sound is coming from my neighbor's garage as he was working with an angle grinder. object didn't produce any sound. you can hear me and my wife speaking in polish.

translation :

where is it? (me)
this i very weird.(me)
no honey (my wife)
yes (me)
balloon or something (my wife)
no (in english)
content.summary: Black slowly rotating bject with constant speed, no sound coming from object.

content.detailedDescription: First of all sorry for my english writing. we were visiting wtc groundzero with my wife. i was capturing continously without focusing a spesific object. i captured many photos. in one minute i captured 3 photos consecutively. after holiday while i and my wife viewing photos we found an unknown object and it was flying above. we didn't detect it with naked eyes when we were visiting wtc. i don't belive that us goverment lets an ordinary vechile to fly above wtc. maybe this is an undetected vechile or it was a made in usa ufo. in photo 1 there are colorful circles. in photo 2 that circles are replacing and an ufo appears suddenly. in photo 3 there is no light no ufo. i want professionals to analyze the images and i am so curious about results. i was not a believer but i was ready to believe. now i want to believe!
content.summary: I was shooting photos continously there were 3 consecutive photos one of them has an ufo!

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the back covered patio smoking, but indian style near the south edge, looking west. the east side of the patio is the house, so i can see s, w, and n. and where i was on the porch could see almost directly above me but not quite.

 as i took a puff i glanced over to my left(south) for some reason and a very bright fuzzy orange light sailed almost instantly from between s and se to between s and sw while also going slightly n, from about 25degrees above the horizon and 2 miles away. it then instantly changed direction to go back to the e between s and se while moving further north still and higher on the horizon. once this happened, it again instantly changed direction, going back to between s and sw, while also moving north toward me thus gaining degrees in the horizon again. then, it got creepy! so it was now about 40-45 degrees in the s sw sky, and did another instant direction change, heading ne again, but this time it noticed me watching it! it didn't make it my s se. right after the instant change to head ne it only made it to due s, instantly changing to head n, directly at me. but it didn't go in a straight line like before. it did several s patterns, like the way a snake slithers, i would say 3, until it came almost directly over my head, at about 85degrees, and instantly stopped, as did my heart! it hovered for roughly 1.5 seconds over a house just 4 houses s, where 3 children between the ages of about 3-8 were playing. the boy and girl yelled at the same, one saying "what is that!" and the other "you see that!" while the young'un started crying. it then reversed in the same s pattern of slithering and i jumped up and took a few steps n to open the sliding door to get my mom to come out to see it, and when i walked back to the spot i was sitting in, it was gone! the father of the children came out a split second after i got back to my spot and the kids were telling him about "that light" and he made them come in. i estimate the altitude of this object at 1000 feet at its closest point to me, when it hovered for a moment.

 i badly wish i had stayed to watch how and where it "vanished", but the whole thing happened so fast, the way it noticed and approached the kids and/or me, and them screaming, freaked me out too! i wanted another adult witness, one that was in the air force to see it. it was doing its thing then noticed us and let us know it sees us, and that we're dumb hairless apes and that if it can do all that imagine how supreme they are over us. a few months later we had a massive flood, the most rainfall in a day ever. 6 months after the fuzzball i got a freak lung abscess that never happens in a 23 year old, and my nails started falling off my fingers but they still haven't fallen off, they're just loose. and the big brother of those kids, who was like 19-21, was just murdered 2 months ago. i'm not saying the orange ball of light caused this, too much time between happenings, but maybe was an omen, idk...And this thing moved! it went from 2 miles to my se to 1.5 miles sw to 1m se to .5m sw to on top of me in 4 seconds. i'm adding a very rough picture i made in paint to show the basic movement, i'm not an artist and don't know how to show point of view and all that so the degrees in the painting are off.. also a google earth 3d picture and a map.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Weird orange fuzzy ball of light that moved at least 2000mph, zig zagged,slithered,stopped,reversed

content.detailedDescription:
It was a sunday evening and i was in the garden cooking on the grill when i looked up into the sky and saw a silvery object with some sharp angles.  i was wearing my contact lenses, it was a bright sunny evening and as we live near to an airport i knew it was not a plane.

my 11 year old daughter was with me so i called her to take a look.  i asker what she thought it was and she was puzzled.  she said that's not a plane.  the object moved slowly and silently, again we are use to planes coming into munich to land and can be heard this close.

i went inside but could not find out digital slr so i grabbed my iphone 5 and ran up to our balcony.  i knew it was heading west to east which was bringing it behind the trees.  i snapped a few photos and a bad video before it dissappeared behind the trees.

when i can back down i went onto the street to see if i could locate it again but could not.  at this point it was heading diagonially away from our house.  this is about the 5 ufo i have seen in the last few years.  it's the first one i was able to get a picture of though they are not very good.
content.summary: Bright slivery object which at first looked like it had some sharp angles.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my friend home. on my way back i saw a ginormous flashing ball of light falling down from the sky at at least 60 mph. it flashed red, green, blue, and white while going down. after i saw it i was scared because i always imagine the worst of things. i lost sight of it because there are so many trees in my neighborhood. i'm pretty sure it landed in yreka, since we live just about 6 miles away.
content.summary: I was walking my friend home and right before i got to my porch a ginormous flashing ball of light flew straight down from the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Saw red lights in the night sky after closing shop on my drive to a friends house.  i arrived at his house and pulled 2 of them outside to look and confirm that i wasn't crazy.  3 red lights moving independently but came together to form a triangle.  after about 15 mins, 2 of the object faded to black while the 3rd made a decent down towards land.  i was not able to see it drop after it dropped below the homes and trees in the distance.
content.summary: Saw while driving to friends, pulled them outside to confirm.  2 faded, 1 dropped down

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a friends house over night hanging out, a few blocks north of downtown, and we stayed up all night playing video games. i stepped outside in the back yard to catch the breeze. he has a picnic table so i lied down on the table top and looked up the stars for a few minutes, saw a shooting star go from se to nw and kept looking up hoping to see more when it happened. at 3:23 a.M. i noticed 5 dim, non blinking, yellow lights, in a v pattern, moving over the top of a tree headed due south toward downtown. i jumped off the table wondering what the hell it could be, looked at my phone for the time, and stood there watching. it flew directly over me at what i guess was 300-350 feet altitude! just slightly higher than the top of the tallest building in town, which is where it was headed. that's when i could see the outline of the craft against the black sky. the stars were clearly visible between the prongs of the v but not the lights, so it was, in fact, one single chevron craft. it made no noise. i lost sight of it about 15 seconds after contact, when it flew behind a tree and into the light coming from the downtown area. i was startled to see it but not scared. i waited around a few minutes before going in and telling my friend, who went out for a while to see if he could spot something. i have always since seeing it thought it to be a secretive u.S.A.F. stealth aerospace craft that was conducting a test to see if its noticeable at low altitudes. if i had not been looking up and the lights weren't on, i wouldn't notice it. i'm sure they fly around with no lights on alot and go unnoticed. absolutely silent. 

i have another very close sighting in abilene that was definitely not ours, and the neighbor kids saw it too and screamed, but can't remember the exact date, first week of  march 2015. i'll be posting that soon.
content.summary: Low and slow cruising chevron

content.detailedDescription: Drove my work pick-up truck east on a graded road and noticed lightning-like bright white flashes beyond the horizon. clear night and starry sky. drove beyond the next valley and see a mixture of the lightning flashes in six quick intervals and a flash of red light on the horizon. the 3rd valley exposed the object to our line of sight which was massive and about 300 yards ne of an a-frame structure i had driven by many times before. this time, the object builds up energy within 3 seconds, getting brighter red, before flashing out. the next flash occurs while we are within the closest proximity of the object (500-600 yards away). we then saw that the object was larger than the a-frame structure and gathered up energy within 3-4 seconds, dim red to bright red before flashing out. noticed that it hovered about 20 ft. above the ground and reminded me of a jellyfish in transparency and had the shape of a pacman ghost, but more fluid. the flash was like that of a flashbulb that photographers used pre-1950's. we rolled the windows down to see if there was any noise or wind, for which there was not. wasn't able to catch video or pics as i noticed we were the only other lighted object in the road and there was a frantic migration of jackrabbits from the south side of the road to the north. i was also being cautious not to hit any possible cattle or antelope that graze in the area. the object repeated the same process maybe 2-3 more times but was at that time in our rear view. by the time we made it all the way out to the paved road, we stopped and exited the truck at a safe distance. staring back, we noticed that the flashing had ended and was replaced by a constant, yet still bluish-white light that was also much smaller. the white light must have been at least 100 ft. or more in the air, but also moved from the a-frame location. the same light then started to move north towards the cinder crater (meriam), before stopping, splitting into two lights, which then shot off in opposite directions (one north and the other south) at top speed, then out of sight. we proceeded south on the paved road back towards flagstaff. we continued to look to the west and saw nothing.
content.summary: Massive red energy orb gathering enrgy before exploding flashes

content.detailedDescription:
I watched 4 intensely glowing objects from a parking lot with 3 other witnesses.
the objects were circular and had a dim dark colored outline, intensely glowing lights. the objects came from north-northeast and traveled southwest. they were a fire-like orange and flickered and pulsed like candles. 
two of the objects were flying close together. the other three objects also were in the sky at the same time, but were spaced further apart.
i heard a low hum which may or may not have been emanating from the objects, as we were next to a busy road.


i am a student and musician, and the other witnesses were my elder brother who is an editor, close friend who is a programmer, and a cleaning lady who was passing by. we were all in awe, and the lady exclaimed that she believed them to be alien spacecraft.

the objects did not appear to be planes, flares or drones. they resembled lanterns, but moved in the same way that a plane would, and looked much like burning meteors flying in sequence or formation.
content.summary: 5 orange fiery glowing objects

content.detailedDescription: While standing out side for a smoke, i observed, at first 2 bright orange objects in the sky heading south to north. they abruptly changed direction towards the west. less that 1 min later, 4 more objects appeared and seemed to be scattered. there did not appear to be a flight pattern. i often see helicopters, as i live a block from the hospital. i am familiar with their flight patterns and directions. i have also seen countless planes, as i live on the coast. i have never seen anything like this, as the flight patterns where not typical.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 - 6 unfamiliar objects in the sky with unusual flight patterns

content.detailedDescription:
I had been sitting out front smoking a cigarette when i heard a rumble coming my way. for the last year i've had "buddies" following me around & i recently asked if i'd see another ufo again or if they'd keep fraudin & stay as orbs. i decided to pull out my phone to video whatever would fly by, when to my surprise it was a dull black triangle, similar to one i've seen before. it flew to the left of the moon(bright object to the right)from overhead & trailing slower behind it was a black helicopter. at first i thought the helicopter was a jet because of the noise, but i also knew the triangle made noise. when the triangle flew above it was the loudest point of the roar. a few days ago i saw the same thing that trailed the triangle & i realized it was a black helicopter, similar to the ones the military uses. i've seen this before & they use to fly around tree tops during the day last august, a month after i started seeing orbs constantly. 

the triangle was a dull color that was darker than the night sky. it looked smoothed & it flew very quickly. i was the only one to see it but my mother, who was sitting in the living room, heard it too as well as my little sister who was video gaming on the second floor. 

the light you see to the left of the video is a neighbors light post.
content.summary: Sitting out front smoking a cigarette when i saw a dark dull triangle zoom above, with a dark helicopter trailing

content.detailedDescription: the flash episode number 28 the darkness and the light. joe gives a gun to iris and in the background you can see ufo landing do trajectory to know where landed
content.summary: the flash episode number 28 the darkness and the light. joe gives a gun to iris and in the background you can see ufo landing do trajectory to know where landed

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting outside on a sunday afternoon 
saw a bright light moving very fast never saw
anything move that fast before it was gone in
seconds.Can't get it out of my mind.
content.summary: Sitting outside on a sunday afternoon saw something very bright and moving very fast never saw anything move that fast ever.

content.detailedDescription: Camping on top of mountain border of greenwood lake, ny and west milford, new jerssy 8:00 pm standing by a small lake and see a ufo, no noise and it was flying so straight line.
content.summary: Silver metal disc bright lights around on/off moving from my right to left

content.detailedDescription:
Between 230-4
didn't see anything until i looked at the photos
there are three objects 
not sure what, if anything, they are.
content.summary: Took a series of over 100 photos of the sky on accident, then saw these in the images.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside coming out from the cabin just outside of hayward, wisconsin to look at the stars. as soon i look at the big dipper, i saw a very bright orange/red light located in between the two top stars (bucket part of the big dipper). the bright light remained standstill the whole time. i stare right at the bright red/orange light trying to figure out what it is whether it has any flashing lights. no flashing lights seen. at first, i thought it was mars but its way too bright and bigger than mars.  it looks like someone is laser beaming into my eyes. after a minute or so after 1st saw it, it started to fade away going backwards (no tail or path seen) and blends along with the rest of the surrounding stars.  i went to town of hayward to report the police and see if there are other people saw the same thing as i do. the police officers said no. i'm the only one that reported. i was hoping that there are other people saw the same thing.
content.summary: Bright orange/red light inside big dipper

content.detailedDescription:
1. walmart neighborhood grocery store corner of s.Campbell and w. grand st springfield mo. i was leaving after shopping. i stopped to video the beautiful cloud formations.
2. i only noticed the object later when editing for "faces in the clouds".
3. i thought it was an ant crawling across my computer screen.
4.Object is cylinder shaped and very large and traveling very fast from north to south.
5.I was thrilled when i discovered it on my machine. i really don't know what others may think but i've never seen any craft move this fast and with a bobbling trajectory.
6.The ufo flew across my video path and was gone.
content.summary: Long cylinder shape size of an aircraft carrier moving between 600 and 6,000 mph

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed a unidentified disc shaped object around 200 ft. away from my location 
it had bright white and blueish pulsating lights it moved in a straight path silently then took sharp left and right turns that nothing man made could've done than about 10 minutes of watching the object it shot up into the sky and vanished 
it was like nothing i've ever seen before
content.summary: Breathtaking
